name: Suites Avenue

reviews.text: The service at this apartment style hotel was excellent! It was comfortable, modern and clean and in a great neighborhood close to many shops and restaurants. We had a terrace room which all rooms don't have. It's worth it to ask for one if they have one available. Thanks to the black out screens and soundproof rooms we were able to sleep like babies. The only complaint about this hotel is that the gym is not very well equipped. However, there is a gym just down the street with very reasonalbe weekly membership dues. I would stay at the Suites Avenue again in a heartbeat and only wish that the Derby chain had more hotels in Europe.
reviews.title: Modern Hotel in a Great Neighborhood

reviews.text: Our family of 4 stayed here for 6 nights in July. We absolutey loved the apartment. I did a lot of research on hotels before going and this was the best choice we made. The apartment was clean and extremely modern. We had the family apartment on the 4th floor overlooking the courtyard. The bathrooms were clean and new. We did not use the kitchen much but loved hanging out in the living room. The big floor to ceiling windows offered a lot of light. The kids loved the 2 pools (rooftop and courtyard). The rooftop pool/view was the best that you can get on Casa Mila. We absolutely enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend this place. The lobby receptionist was extremely helpful with directions/maps. The location of the hotel cannot be beat either - in the center of all the shopping and awesome restaurants nearby.
reviews.title: a wonderful place to stay in Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've been to Barcelona five times and this is by far the best location and room we've had.
reviews.title: Perfect apartment and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in a "Superior" suite with view over the courtyard for seven nights. The room had both a dishwasher and washing machine with built in tumble dryer. The hotel supplies detergent for both machines. It's great to be able to clean your used underwear and socks.
reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic!

reviews.text: The room is very quiet, we didn't hear any of the other guests.
reviews.title: I love Suites Avenue!!

reviews.text: Spent three nights here and it was the best - great accommodations, great location and great security. Even the minibar items were both high qualiity and reasonably priced -- excellent full bottles of wine at 18 euros. The rooftop pool area is a super place to relax
reviews.title: Super apartment style facility; super location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent two nights at these fab apartments. From the external frontage to the delightful interior everything about this establishment is top notch. The location on the Passeig de Gracia is perfect. Right in the hub of things i.e Designer shops,bars and the all important Metro. Then a calming delight awaits you in the form of a ultra trendy comfortable suite. The Reception staff are very friendly and happy to help in any way.
reviews.title: Wow Factor Suites

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 4 days during our trip to Barcelona. It was one of the highlights of our trip. The staff was very friendly and helpful. If you're planning to stay here, I strongly recommend you book the penthouse. Having your breakfast at the private terrace opposite one of Gaudi's master pieces is priceless. We felt like home, no questions about it. If we ever go to Barcelona again (which I hope we will) we'll certainly stay here.
reviews.title: Awesome!

reviews.text: This is excellent accommodation which is modern and well maintained. The apartment had everything we would need and it was great having a balcony which overlooked the courtyard. The pool and roof terrace were exactly what was needed after a day of sightseeing. The apartments are well placed for all the main attractions. Metro station closeby and loads of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby.
reviews.title: Beautiful accommodation in the heart of Barcelona.

reviews.text: The staff were friendly and helpful. I would recommend this to others whether for business or leisure. We will definitely return to suites avenue on our next visit to Barcelona.
reviews.title: Yes, Yes, and Yes!!

reviews.text: This is a very good choice for staying in Barcelona and I would highly recommend it.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay in Barcelona

reviews.text: The rooms are very spacious, clean and well equipped. The building is architecurally very nice. The front-staff are very professional and helpful although there is only one person at a time at the front-desk which could mean lines if there are several people checking in at the same time. This was not a real problem during my stay though.
reviews.title: Wonderful apartment hotel and staff

reviews.text: The location is excellent in the center of Barcelona.
reviews.title: Fantastic accommodation in a wonderful city

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was an ideal accomodation for us in the middle of our Spain trip. The apartment and building were modern, beautiful and perfectly maintained. Wonderful location in the Eixample right across from La Podrera and a reasonable walk or cab ride to all major sights. Too many good restaurants in the area to count and a very inexpensive bodega on the next block to fill the kitchen larder for breakfast and beverages. The staff was terrific -- all of the concierges speak fluent English and provided spot-on recommendations concerning transportation and restaurants. The tour bus stops a block away and there is a taxi stand right in front of the building. It was nice to have a modern washer and dryer in the middle of our trip since laundry is so expensive in hotels. And for the location, the room rate was remarkably fair.
reviews.title: Unique apartment-hotel accomodations in a striking building

reviews.text: We stayed here for 7 nights from July 25th. The suite was superb. It was immaculately clean and very well equipped. The provision of a washing machine was an added bonus. The rooftop pool is fabulous and was the highlight for out 6 year old. The staff are excellent with fluent English. The location was fantastic. Everything within walking distance and sourrounded by restaurants and shops. The tours buses operate from just outside the hotel. We moved to the penthouse for the last 3 days. Well worth the extra money. Will definitely be returning
reviews.title: Perfect!!
Great stay and well cituated
reviews.text: A great stay in the heart of Barcelona. Loved the blackout curtains. Very easy to walk around the city. Close to shopping and excellent restaurants. A great place if you are staying for a week and want the odd night in with a bottle of local wine and food. The gym is very basic and could do with improvement, but apart from that it was a great stay.

Best location ( near high end shops like Hugo Boss, Louis Vuitton ) on the famous Passeig de Gracia. Secured entry. You have to "buzz" the reception to enter. Amenities like kitchen, washer/dryer. Clean, modern, check out the roof top with a swimming pool and great view of the city. a few steps to Starbucks- my coffee is important to me.
reviews.title: Hidden Gem in the Heart of Barcelona

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hugo Nunes- Best Hotelier, accommodating and always greeted our group with a smile. We will go back to Suites Avenue over and over again. Thanks so much for a grat 5 days!!!!
reviews.title: Great location and excellent apartment!

reviews.text: Great location, walking distance to Diagonal Metro Station, shopping, tourist buses just outside. Great & modern apartment, with all necessary equipment on the kitchen including a dish-washer and Nespresso coffee machine. Great view from roof terrace, with a nice pool (not big enough for swimming but good for relaxation in the end of a hard day of walking & shopping). Staff very friendly and helpful!
reviews.title: Great location and fabulous apartment

reviews.text: The location could not be better. One block from the Metro and central to all sites. Apartment well equipped-- 2 gorgeous bathrooms, one bedroom and comfortable leather sofa in living area.
reviews.title: Great place, good location

description: Suites Avenue, inaugurated in spring of 2009, is a new option for accommodations in Barcelona, directly opposite Gaudí's La Pedrera.These luxury tourist apartments are ideal for medium- to long-term stays and designed especially for family holidays and business trips.Located in the Eixample neighbourhood right on Barcelona's Passeig de Gràcia occupies a recently built avant-garde building with a spectacular stainless steel façade designed by Japanese architect Toyo Ito. It is a building that draws the attention of Barcelona residents and tourists alike, and it has become an architectural icon.Suites Avenue has independent apartments of 45 to 86 m2, with one or two luxury bedrooms, independent kitchen, sitting-dining room and shared services like two outdoor swimming pool, a solarium, a communal terrace with views looking over Passeig de Gràcia, a gym, a sauna and a museum with original Hindu and Buddhist pieces on display.ServicesLuxury apartments equipped with all electrical appliances, furniture and utensils in the following categories: 6 superior, 12 superior Pedrera View, 15 deluxe, 6 deluxe Pedrera view, 2 Pedrera penthouse24-hour reception serviceWi-Fi in all areas2 outdoor swimming pool and solariumGym and saunaMassages on request Business centerHindu and Buddhist museumMini barBreakfast serviceParkingCleaning serviceLaundry and ironing serviceSmall dogs allowedShould you require anything further, or find you have time on your hands that you would like to spend doing something original and unique, please let us know. The concierge will provide assistance to make your stay in Barcelona a success.
